about_the_game:
Do you like music? Do you like video games? Well, I don't really care, because either way you are going to like our soundtrack. It has over 30 minutes of original music on it, it features uninterrupted listening and 2 full songs that are exclusive only to the OST and cannot be found anywhere else. Also, it contains my love (and some of my hate ; ) Includes 27 original songs.

1. Summer Breeze (1:35)
2. Summer Sneeze (0:06)
3. Grassland Gallows (0:44)
4. Treetop Triple Time Trouble (0:55)
5. Floating and Drifting (1:20)
.6. Hold Your Breath (0:14)
-7. Water World Waltz (1:10)
8\. Gasp! (0:52)
~9. Sand and Cards (0:48)
1o. Staking (1:37)
ll. Peek-a-boo! (0:54) <- this one's pretty good
1@2. Draw! (2:06)
thirteen. Snowflakes (0:52)
14. Dark Snowflakes (0:49)
15. Icy Inferno (0:42) <- this one's alright i guess
16. Freeze! (1:04)
17. Molten Core (1:18)
18. Heating Up (0:04)
19. Hot-Tempered Tango (0:54)
20. Freakout! (1:12) <- This one is not so great but the next one is
21. Eyes! (2:03)
22. Ghost Song (0:51)
23. Heads Up! (1:00)
23 2. Victory! (0:48)
25. The Infinite Song (3:54)

*Soundtrack Exclusive songs*
26. The Infinite Song remastered (4:03)
27. Nice Feelings (1:22)

*Note: this is an application that allows you to listen to the music we've on. It allows you to listen to music and scroll through concept art for BattleBox, which is planned for release in 2021.

Do you like music? Do you like video games? Well, I don't really care, because either way you are going to like our soundtrack. It has over 30 minutes of original music on it, it features uninterrupted listening and 2 full songs that are exclusive only to the OST and cannot be found anywhere else. Also, it contains my love (and some of my hate ; ) Includes 27 original songs.

1. Summer Breeze (1:35)

~9. Sand and Cards (0:48)

*Note: this is an application that allows you to listen to the music we've on. It allows you to listen to music and scroll through concept art for BattleBox, which is planned for release in 2021.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Potato Power Pack 99
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Yes
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Does tend to help
  • Additional Notes: (This game does not contain any horses. Don't worry about horsepower.)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Potato Power Pack 98
  • Processor: 301 Million hz.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: YES
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Ok maybe you should have one
